titleStmt.title: Perry J. Nichols to Thomas E. Bramlette
CWG2265

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

msIdentifier.repository: Kentucky Department for Libraries and Archives
msIdentifier.collection: Office of the Governor, Thomas E. Bramlette: Appointments by the Governor, Civil Appointments, 1863-1867

body.p:
New Richmond Ohio
Oct 23rd 1865
To His Excellency
Gov Bramlet
Hon Sir

I would be under great obligations for an appointment for you as a commissioner to take the acknowledgements of Deeds & other writings in and for the county of Clermont and State of Ohio -- We have no commissions in this county. Perry J Donham was but he has recently moved from this place (New Richmond)=New Richmond has about 3,000 inhabitants & on the Ohio river 20 miles above Cincinnati=& to have a commission here would greatly accomodate the people here
Be Kind enought to do me the favor of granting this appointment And send me the proper forms or Blanks=

With Much Respect
Perry J. Nichols
New Richmond
Ohi

Comr of Deeds
Ohio
P. J. Nichols
comd
25 Oct 1865
